description: Apparently only shows the available options in the selected device category. For example, I would like to quickly change between Analog audio and Digital SPDIF. Doesn't work, this extension doesn't list anything else. I still have to change the device through the actual settings.
summary: Limited options -- showing options only for the selected device

description: Only list devices but switch not work ...

description:
Pour système à 2 ou plus sorties son.
